description: As digital transactions continue to dominate global commerce, online fraud has grown both in scale and sophistication. title: Where does human thinking end and AI begin? An AI authorship protocol aims to show the difference
description: The latest generation of artificial intelligence models is sharper and smoother, producing polished text with fewer errors and hallucinations. As a philosophy professor, I have a growing fear: When a polished essay no longer shows that a student did the thinking, the grade above it becomes hollow—and so does the diploma.

title: No more turbulence as airline makes major change to reduce risk of bumpy flights
description: Good news for nervous flyers, as a major airline is using artificial intelligence to try and reduce the risk of turbulent and bumpy flights.
content:
If you’re a nervous flyer who can’t bear the thought of turbulence, you might want to book yourself onto an Emirates flight.
It might seem like a fantasy to be able to enjoy your on-board coke and pringles without so much as a bump, but the famously ... [2566 chars]

title: Meta’s higher spending in pursuit of AI payoff shakes investors
